panel.name: rlva_scroll_panel

check_box.label: Enable Restrained Love (A)
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the Restrained Love (A) features on or off. This option allows extended controls over the Viewer with scripts such as restricting certain feature or changing windlight presets. Warning this feature is officially unsupported and might be outdated and broken partly or completely.
check_box.name: RLVa

check_box.label: Enable OOC with restricted Chat
check_box.tool_tip: This option enables writing Out-Of-Character chat even when chat is restricted by RLVa.
check_box.name: RLVaOOC

check_box.label: Forbid changing Windlight settings via RLV
check_box.tool_tip: This option forbids RLVa to change windlight presets. <icon>ToolTip_Spacer</icon> <icon>Popup_Caution</icon> Changing this option needs a restart
check_box.name: RLVaNSE

check_box.label: Use RLV Ellipsis
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the '...' display when someone is typing, while the avatar is prevented from hearing.
check_box.name: RLVaEllipsis

check_box.label: Enable Composite Folders
check_box.tool_tip: This option enables the usage of composite folders for the shared inventory.
check_box.name: RLVaCompo

check_box.label: Enable Legacy folder naming
check_box.tool_tip: This option enables legacy naming convention for RLVa folders.
check_box.name: RLVaLNaming

check_box.label: Enable shared Wear
check_box.tool_tip: This option allows attachments in the shared #RLV folder to be force-attached without needing to specify an attachment point.
check_box.name: RLVaSharedWear

check_box.label: Disable blocking of replace wearables
check_box.tool_tip: This option disables blocking the wear/replace inventory command when at least one attachment on the target attachment point is non-detachable.
check_box.name: RLVaReplaceWearables

check_box.label: Disable giving sub-folders to the RLV folder
check_box.tool_tip: This option disallows giving sub-folders into the #RLV folder.
check_box.name: RLVaFGT

check_box.label: Hide locked wearable layers
check_box.tool_tip: This option hides worn clothing layers from the '@getoutfit' command which have a 'remove outfit' restriction applied.
check_box.name: RLVaHidelocked

check_box.label: Hide locked attachments
check_box.tool_tip: This option hides non-detachable worn attachments from the '@getattach' command.
check_box.name: RLVaHideattachs

check_box.label: Hide 'unset' or 'duplicate' commands
check_box.tool_tip: This option suppresses reporting the 'unset' or 'duplicate' command restrictions when 'Restrained Love Debug Messages' is enabled.
check_box.name: RLVaHUD

check_box.label: Auto. rename shared inventory items
check_box.tool_tip: This option automatically renames shared inventory items when they are worn.
check_box.name: RLVaARename

check_box.label: Restrained Love (A) Debug messages:
check_box.tool_tip: This option enables showing all RLV commands which would be normally hidden. This option should only be enabled for debugging.
check_box.name: RLVaDebug

check_box.label: Show Assertion failures
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the notification of the user when an assertion fails.
check_box.name: RLVaAssertion

panel.text: 'Add' wearables in a folder beginning with:

line_editor.name: RLVaReplacebegins
line_editor.tool_tip: This option sets a string for folders in which the attach behavior will always be 'replace' instead of 'add' should they begin with this. Leaving this field empty will disable this behavior.

panel.text: 'Replace' wearables in a folder beginning with:

line_editor.name: RLVaReplacebegins
line_editor.tool_tip: This option sets a string for folders in which the attach behavior will always be 'add' instead of 'replace' should they begin with this. The default is '+'. Leaving this field empty will disable this behavior.

radio_item.label: Default
radio_item.tool_tip: This option changes the embedding behavior for notification panels to always embed into the IM window. <red>It is currently unknown what this option exactly does or if it has any impact.</red>
radio_item.name: radio_default

radio_item.label: Focused
radio_item.tool_tip: This option changes the embedding behavior for notification panels to embed into the IM window only when the window is focused. <red>It is currently unknown what this option exactly does or if it has any impact.</red>
radio_item.name: radio_focused

radio_item.label: Never
radio_item.tool_tip: This option changes the embedding behavior for notification panels to never embed into the IM window. <red>It is currently unknown what this option exactly does or if it has any impact.</red>
radio_item.name: radio_never
